UIText.text: Everyone should always be concerned on how much data we are publicly sharing and how the data is eventually used.

DialogueNode.optionText: Can you protect your data from other hackers?

UIText.text: There are many ways on how we can protect our data that requires a little effort.
Using a password manager allows us to create super-strong passwords to ensure the security.
Try browsing with Duck Duck Go, a search engine that never stores your search data.
Turn on two-factor authorization for your key accounts (like email and bank).
Take the Tor browser for a test drive, it prevents somebody from watching or listening to your online activities.

UIText.Text: Thank you for chatting with me!
